EmailTemplate.description: Response for Customer Care when a Service Request has been closed
EmailTemplate.name: Customer Care - Service Request Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Service Request Closed RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Purina Customer Care. Your Service Request #{!Case.CaseNumber} request which was received on {!Case.Created_Date__c} via {!Case.Origin} has been closed. Should you have additional questions or require further information, feel free to contact us at 1-800-522-3354.
Purina Customer Care
